short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Out of all the ways to copy a link, this is one!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking the extension icon copies the current tab's title and URL as a rich text formatted link onto the clipboard for pasting into other places.  That's it!

This extension is open sourced at https://github.com/kurrik/copyiest-extension
